front.title: Remote Network Monitoring MIB Protocol Identifier Reference Extensions

abstract.t: This memo defines extensions to the Protocol Identifier Referencedocument for the identification of application verb information. It doesnot obsolete any portion of the Protocol Identifier Reference document.In particular, it describes the algorithms required to identify protocoloperations (verbs) within the protocol encapsulations managed with theRemote Network Monitoring MIB Version 2, RFC 2021.
